idea-plugin.name: Odoo Run Configuration
idea-plugin.description: Streamline your Odoo development workflow in PyCharm with a dedicated run configuration type. Stop manually setting up generic Python scripts for every project. This plugin provides a specialized "Odoo" run configuration with dedicated fields for the odoo-bin executable, database name, addons paths, and other common parameters. Features include a user-friendly list editor for managing addons paths and a powerful template system to save and reuse your common configurations across projects.
